Class AbstractFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractFunction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RingDiffusionFunction

    public abstract class AbstractFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides an implementation of a function so it can be used in various ode's. Instead of developing a symbolic solver this is the easiest way to protect variations for each function.
    Author:
    nicolav0
